fields.Title: INVENTORY / RUBY'S JOURNAL
fields.Description: Here you can learn about Ruby's involvement with La Puta Madre.

fields.Title: Empathy: "No, stop... He wouldn't do that."
fields.Dialogue Text: No, stop... He wouldn't do that.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Either way, we need to keep an eye..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Either way, we need to keep an eye on him. Somewhere along the way, we might have been fed a lie or two..."

fields.Title: You: "Put the journal away. [Leave.]"
fields.Dialogue Text: Put the journal away. [Leave.]

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "Schneller is a stationary brand fro..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Schneller is a stationary brand from Gottwald beloved among architects and engineers.

fields.Title: Ruby's Journal: "The large cursive of someone who wr..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The large cursive of someone who writes quickly and confidently.

fields.Title: You: "What did she write the day Lely die..."
fields.Dialogue Text: What did she write the day Lely died?

fields.Title: You: "Read the entry from March 12th."
fields.Dialogue Text: Read the entry from March 12th.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Maybe there's a Hardie boy we've y..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Maybe there's a Hardie boy we've yet to meet who acted as his accomplice? Either way, we need to keep an eye on him."

fields.Title: You: ""No mention of La Puta Madre...""
fields.Dialogue Text: "No mention of La Puta Madre..."

fields.Title: Conceptualization: "She's got good taste and must have..."
fields.Dialogue Text: She's got good taste and must have taken whatever she recorded here seriously.

fields.Title: Ruby's Journal: "It's a mix of logistical notes, dia..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It's a mix of logistical notes, diagrams, and personal reflections, all dated.

fields.Title: Ruby's Journal: "The first entry is from August 2nd..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The first entry is from August 2nd of last year. It reads simply: "I know my position is precarious. All I can do is make myself as useful as I can while looking for a way out. (Remember: no one is indispensable.)"

fields.Title: Ruby's Journal: "Hard to tell exactly -- it's mostly..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Hard to tell exactly -- it's mostly noted down in code. Looks like contact information, quantities, directions.

fields.Title: Ruby's Journal: ""Been holed up here for three days..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Been holed up here for three days now. I'm used to being alone and all, but -- I don't know when I'll be able to leave, or if I'll be ratted out. They *will* rat me out, of course. I've made it a point to believe in the best in people (the boys, for example), but -- experience tells me..."

fields.Title: Ruby's Journal: ""Even when I leave here (if I leave..."
fields.Dialogue Text:
"Even when I leave here (if I leave here alive) -- what's my next move?... Staging a lynching is a crime, even if I'm not accused of murder on top of that. Forever on the run? Not really my idea of the open road. 

Man, I was really looking forward to winning."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No, it's dirty.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "No, it's dirty."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I wouldn't go so far as to say tha..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I wouldn't go so far as to say that -- we have other reasons to arrest her." He frowns.

fields.Title: Ruby's Journal: "The most recent entry is from today..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The most recent entry is from today. It reads:

fields.Title: You: ""T-man wouldn't fuck me over!""
fields.Dialogue Text: "T-man wouldn't fuck me over!"

fields.Title: Jump to: [Ruby's Journal: "The thick journal bound in brown le..."]
Ruby's Journal: "It's made of full-grain leather. Th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It's made of full-grain leather. The lower left corner of the back cover sports an embossed brand name: "SCHNELLER."

fields.Title: Empathy: "This was important to her -- when i..."
fields.Dialogue Text: This was important to her -- when it was still hers.

fields.Title: You: ""I don't know...""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I don't know..."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""We could learn a lot from this.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "We could learn a lot from this."

fields.Title: Logic: "She is referring to betraying her p..."
fields.Dialogue Text: She is referring to betraying her previous employer. Does this suggest she did it in self-defence?

fields.Title: Half Light: "You didn't follow through. You shou..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You didn't follow through. You should have shot her in the head.

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "Is it? Can you be sure? What if you..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Is it? Can you be sure? What if you are secretly being manipulated by La Puta Madre as you pursue this investigation. What if he wiped your memory on purpose?

fields.Title: You: "This is not me. I wouldn't do somet..."
fields.Dialogue Text: This is not me. I wouldn't do something like that.

fields.Title: You: "No, I couldn't."
fields.Dialogue Text: No, I couldn't.

fields.Title: Ruby's Journal: ""Did M feel truly betrayed by me? I..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Did M feel truly betrayed by me? I was feeling threatened -- he'd have to know if he threatened people, they'd take measures to protect themselves. Even I know that. Economic measures first of all. Gotta make a living, right. I can still hear his voice in the receiver, taste the plastic..."

fields.Title: You: ""Seems plausible.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Seems plausible."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Either way, we need to keep an eye..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Either way, we need to keep an eye on her."
fields.Alternate1: "Either way, we should go back to the Whirling, see if we can find out more about her time there."

fields.Title: Logic: "On purpose? That's pretty far-fetch..."
fields.Dialogue Text: On purpose? That's pretty far-fetched.

fields.Title: Ruby's Journal: ""Great. M's peone is coming to town..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Great. M's peone is coming to town, no doubt to investigate the lynching, but also -- I feel it in my gut -- to finally put a bullet in my head. While I'm napping in my lorry or on a smoke break... Well, I won't stick around just to twist my own neck by constantly looking over my shoulder."

fields.Title: Jump to: [You: "Read the entry from March 12th."]
Half Light: "Too late to do that now, *assassino..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Too late to do that now, *assassino grande*! Better start looking over your shoulder now.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No, I don't think you are." He loo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No, I don't think you are." He looks you straight in the eye for a moment, then sighs. "Ask someone in your precinct if you want to be sure."

fields.Title: You: ""Who *is* La Puta Madre?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Who *is* La Puta Madre?"

fields.Title: You: ""So she died for nothing?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "So she died for nothing?"

fields.Title: You: ""Then who do you think killed Lely?..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Then who do you think killed Lely?" (Conclude.)
fields.Alternate1: "Then who do you think killed the merc?" (Conclude.)

fields.Title: You: ""But no one heard the shot...""
fields.Dialogue Text: "But no one heard the shot..."

fields.Title: Ruby's Journal: "The journal falls open. About two t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The journal falls open. About two thirds of its ruled pages have been filled.

fields.Title: Ruby's Journal: "Short, wry observations of people a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Short, wry observations of people and places -- probably a way to pass the time on the road. Also, what appear to be attempts to sort through some difficult decisions. There are a few passages with many questions in them.

fields.Title: Drama: "He truly does not believe you are...."
fields.Dialogue Text: He truly does not believe you are. Perhaps he shouldn't be so trusting...

fields.Title: Volition: "His trust is well placed. You aren'..."
fields.Dialogue Text: His trust is well placed. You aren't. You can *feel* it.

fields.Title: You: ""But no one heard the shot...""
fields.Dialogue Text: "But no one heard the shot..."

fields.Title: Ruby's Journal: "The entry ends abruptly."
fields.Dialogue Text: The entry ends abruptly.

fields.Title: Logic: "You have no idea what she means. Th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You have no idea what she means. These are personal notes, don't expect to understand all of it.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Klaasje was the one who pointed th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Klaasje was the one who pointed the finger at Ruby. Perhaps she was trying to steer us away from herself? Or..." He stops to think.

fields.Title: Volition: "Don't get emotional."
fields.Dialogue Text: Don't get emotional.

fields.Title: You: "How far back do the entries go?"
fields.Dialogue Text: How far back do the entries go?

fields.Title: You: "Anything personal?"
fields.Dialogue Text: Anything personal?

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""There could be useful information..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "There could be useful information about local operations in those notes. We have a junior sergeant at my station who's good with codes -- I can give this to her after we finish this."

fields.Title: Ruby's Journal: ""Even when I leave here (if I leave..."
fields.Dialogue Text:
"Even when I leave here (if I leave here alive) -- what's my next move?... Staging a lynching is a crime, even if I'm not accused of murder on top of that. Forever on the run? Not really my idea of the open road. 

Man, I was really looking forward to winning."

fields.Title: Empathy: "No, not even the old you. No you wo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: No, not even the old you. No you would do that.

fields.Title: Composure: "Kim's posture is unusually rigid --..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Kim's posture is unusually rigid -- he's used to this sort of thing, but he's not particularly happy about being used to it.

fields.Title: Authority: "Staff issues, always tough on the l..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Staff issues, always tough on the leadership. You smell traces of betrayal.

fields.Title: You: "Am I sure this is a mistake? Look a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Am I sure this is a mistake? Look at me.

fields.Title: Authority: "The call was a courtesy. He must ha..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The call was a courtesy. He must have held her in high regard to personally tell her he knew about her plan to run drugs for the competition.

fields.Title: You: "Flip through the pages."
fields.Dialogue Text: Flip through the pages.

fields.Title: Reaction Speed: ""The call"? Did M call her personal..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The call"? Did M call her personally? Why?

fields.Title: You: "What kinds of logistics?"
fields.Dialogue Text: What kinds of logistics?

fields.Title: You: "What's the most recent entry? (Conc..."
fields.Dialogue Text: What's the most recent entry? (Conclude with journal.)

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "Things played out just as she had f..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Things played out just as she had feared. Except *you* didn't shoot her.

fields.Title: Half Light: "It's in you to do something like th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It's in you to do something like this -- kill her. Physically at least. You could pull the trigger if you had to.

fields.Title: Logic: "Small wonder -- would you talk abou..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Small wonder -- would you talk about La Puta Madre in your journal? You do see an 'M' though -- La Puta Madre? 'M' is mentioned on March 9th and March 15th.

fields.Title: You: "Not now."
fields.Dialogue Text: Not now.

fields.Title: Empathy: "That must have been one hell of a c..."
fields.Dialogue Text: That must have been one hell of a conversation.

fields.Title: Ruby's Journal: "A thick journal. The cover is worn,..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A thick journal. The cover is worn, like someone used to carry it around in their back pocket.

fields.Title: You: "What a coincidence..."
fields.Dialogue Text: What a coincidence...

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""The head of a major Jamrock gang s..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The head of a major Jamrock gang specializing in drug production and trafficking -- a very bad person."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Could have been Titus. Then again...."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Could have been Titus. Then again..." He pauses to think.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It looks like she might have been...."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It looks like she might have been... framed?" The lieutenant taps on the page.
fields.Alternate1: "I just don't think she killed the mercenary. It's mostly a gut feeling, though, since we let her walk out without hearing her side of the story."

fields.Title: You: ""She killed the merc, then turned t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "She killed the merc, then turned the gun on herself -- case closed. It's so tidy!"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It's good she left in a hurry. We..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's good she left in a hurry. We could learn a lot from this..."

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "Whatever you may *look* like, you d..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Whatever you may *look* like, you don't *feel* like a hired assassin.

fields.Title: Esprit de Corps: "You should show all this to the lie..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You should show all this to the lieutenant, see what he makes of it.

fields.Title: You: "Read the entry from March 9th first..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Read the entry from March 9th first.

fields.Title: You: "Goddamn right, I should have."
fields.Dialogue Text: Goddamn right, I should have.

fields.Title: You: "I'm okay with the idea."
fields.Dialogue Text: I'm okay with the idea.

fields.Title: Half Light: "Something tells you you should be e..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Something tells you you should be extra careful from now on.

fields.Title: You: ""Kim, am I really a La Puta Madre a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Kim, am I really a La Puta Madre agent?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""She was in plenty of trouble even..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "She was in plenty of trouble even without the murder charge." He looks down. "Still, it's a nasty business."

fields.Title: Volition: "Professionalism is his coping mecha..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Professionalism is his coping mechanism.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""What about this 'M'?" He points at..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What about this 'M'?" He points at the page you're staring at. "Could this be La Puta Madre? Here: March 9th and March 15th."

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "The thought steadies your nerves. T..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The thought steadies your nerves. The journal stops shaking in your hand.

fields.Title: You: "Unwind the strap. (Move on.)"
fields.Dialogue Text: Unwind the strap. (Move on.)

fields.Title: You: "Study the handwriting."
fields.Dialogue Text: Study the handwriting.

fields.Title: You: "Examine the cover."
fields.Dialogue Text: Examine the cover.

fields.Title: You: "Anything about... La Puta Madre?"
fields.Dialogue Text: Anything about... La Puta Madre?

fields.Title: Ruby's Journal: "Esoteric radio technology. The most..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Esoteric radio technology. The most recent ones probably pertain to the Latitude Compressor: sketches, calculations of distance and density. You make out a familiar spiral shape.

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "That's a good, pragmatic approach."
fields.Dialogue Text: That's a good, pragmatic approach.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Besides, I'm not sure her life as..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Besides, I'm not sure her life as a fugitive is going to be much better than with us."
fields.Alternate1: "Besides, I'm not sure her life as a fugitive is going to be much better than with us. Especially if she has problems with the Madre."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I don't think she killed the merce..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I don't think she killed the mercenary." The lieutenant taps on the page. "It looks like she might have been... framed?"
fields.Alternate1: "I don't think she killed the mercenary." The lieutenant taps on the page. "It looks like she might have been... framed? Too bad we didn't really get to hear her side of the story."

fields.Title: Esprit de Corps: "This whole thing was a detour -- an..."
fields.Dialogue Text: This whole thing was a detour -- and a fatal one, he thinks.

fields.Title: Esprit de Corps: "That would be a first -- or a fourt..."
fields.Dialogue Text: That would be a first -- or a fourth -- but who's counting, he thinks. Very rarely does anyone actually get framed.

fields.Title: You: ""Okay. What do you mean, framed?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Okay. What do you mean, framed?"

fields.Title: You: ""If she didn't do it, then maybe it..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "If she didn't do it, then maybe it's good that we didn't catch her?"

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "Maybe it's the old you? Or maybe sh..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Maybe it's the old you? Or maybe she was just paranoid...

fields.Title: You: "What are the diagrams of?"
fields.Dialogue Text: What are the diagrams of?

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Maybe she had an accomplice. Eithe..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Maybe she had an accomplice. Either way, we need to keep an eye on her."
fields.Alternate1: "Maybe she had an accomplice. Either way, we should go back to the Whirling, see if we can find out more about her time there."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""One thing is for certain: We have..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "One thing is for certain: We have business back in the Whirling-in-Rags. Questions to ask. We should get to it."
fields.Alternate1: "One thing is for certain: We have business back in the Whirling-in-Rags. Questions to ask. Let's be careful though -- the tip she gave us about the tribunal was... disturbing."

fields.Title: You: "This is a coincidence. I would neve..."
fields.Dialogue Text: This is a coincidence. I would never kill people for a mob boss.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""By the Hardie boys, by Klaasje, by..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "By the Hardie boys, by Klaasje, by us."

fields.Title: You: "Flip through the pages again."
fields.Dialogue Text: Flip through the pages again.

fields.Title: Ruby's Journal: "Nothing on March 4th... March 5th,..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Nothing on March 4th... March 5th, though: "Well, *that's* bound to come back and bite me in the ass. I'm bad at this -- loyal to a fault. Except... But that's another matter entirely."

fields.Title: Half Light: "Yes, you could. You'd pull it one,..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Yes, you could. You'd pull it one, two, three times -- and watch her fall.

fields.Title: Drama: "He's not 100% sure you're not indeb..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He's not 100% sure you're not indebted to this very, very bad person.

fields.Title: Ruby's Journal: "The thick journal bound in brown le..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The thick journal bound in brown leather is full of candour and diagrams.

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "Were you *supposed* to find her, ev..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Were you *supposed* to find her, even apart from the investigation, then? On M's request? No, you wouldn't do something like this. This must be a mistake.

fields.Title: You: ""Seems plausible.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Seems plausible."

fields.Title: You: ""I don't know...""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I don't know..."

fields.Title: Interfacing: "Perhaps too confidently -- many phr..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Perhaps too confidently -- many phrases and even paragraphs have been crossed out, with tiny corrections scrawled above and in the margins.

fields.Title: Conceptualization: "She had good taste and must have ta..."
fields.Dialogue Text: She had good taste and must have taken what she recorded here seriously.

fields.Title: Interfacing: "The way some of those question mark..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The way some of those question marks trail off into ellipses -- she was going through a tough time.

fields.Title: You: "(Look at the cover again.)"
fields.Dialogue Text: (Look at the cover again.)

fields.Title: Ruby's Journal: "That name isn't mentioned as far as..."
fields.Dialogue Text: That name isn't mentioned as far as you can tell.

fields.Title: Ruby's Journal: ""Then again, isn't that what I've b..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Then again, isn't that what I've been doing ever since I got the call."
